recipesJson.name: Mama's Apple Pie Wrapped In Donut
recipesJson.author: JenniferJarvis
recipesJson.description:
Crazy Good Apple Pie In A Donut... Talked about it on  the show Mixing It Up episode #12   Flakey donut, wrapped around a layered apple pie filling.  THe pie crust adds to the donut flavors, with a rich smattering of cinnamon and a dash of creamy on top. 



For More Mixing Tips and Info Visit my Site and Youtube Channel: 
http://flavor-pro.com/
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCA6gV-5vxieuG2_TcIKpYCg

reviews.text: Definitely had shaky hands using the brie cheese, But this stuff is good!

pageContext.name: Mama's Apple Pie Wrapped In Donut
